bowtie_align

Source: R/Functions.R
bowtie_align.Rd

Alignment using Rbowtie2

bowtie_align(
  fq,
  index,
  bam = file.path(dirname(fq), paste0("Sorted_", gsub("\\.fa|\\.fasta|\\.fastq",
    "", basename(fq)), ".bam")),
  format = "fasta",
  keepSAM = T,
  maxMismatches = 1,
  seedSubString = 18,
  threads = 1,
  report_k = NULL
)

Arguments

fq

File to process.
index

Index name
bam

Output bam name
format

Format of reads (fastq or fasta)
keepSAM

keep bowtie2 SAM output file, default = T
maxMismatches

max mismatches
seedSubString

length of seed substrings
threads

Number of threads to use
report_k

number of alignments to report

Value

Path to BAM

Examples

testFasta <- system.file("extdata/hg19Small.fa",package="CLIPflexR")
myIndex <- bowtie2_index(testFasta)

testFQ <- system.file("extdata/Fox3_Std_small.fq.gz",package="CLIPflexR")
FqFile_FF <- ctk_fastqFilter(testFQ,qsFilter = "mean:0-29:20",verbose=TRUE)
#> fastq_filter.pl command is /Users/kathryn/Library/r-miniconda/envs/CLIPflexR_0.1.19/bin/ctk/fastq_filter.pl
#> fastq_filter.pl arguments are /Users/kathryn/Library/r-miniconda/envs/CLIPflexR_0.1.19/bin/ctk/fastq_filter.pl  -if sanger  -of fastq  -f mean:0-29:20  /private/var/folders/rx/rt8glh297vbg70g644dpwy6w0000gn/T/Rtmp7xIt5c/temp_libpath160e7360bd99c/CLIPflexR/extdata/Fox3_Std_small.fq.gz  /private/var/folders/rx/rt8glh297vbg70g644dpwy6w0000gn/T/Rtmp7xIt5c/temp_libpath160e7360bd99c/CLIPflexR/extdata/FF_Fox3_Std_small.fq.gz 
FqFile <- decompress(FqFile_FF,overwrite=TRUE)
FqFile_clipped <- fastx_clipper(FqFile,length=20)
FqFile_QF <- fastq_quality_trimmer(FqFile_clipped)
FqFile_QF <- fastq_quality_trimmer(FqFile_clipped,paste0(FqFile_QF,".gz"))
FqFile_Col <- ctk_fastq2collapse(FqFile_QF,verbose=TRUE)
#> fastq_filter.pl command is /Users/kathryn/Library/r-miniconda/envs/CLIPflexR_0.1.19/bin/ctk/fastq2collapse.pl
#> fastq_filter.pl arguments are /Users/kathryn/Library/r-miniconda/envs/CLIPflexR_0.1.19/bin/ctk/fastq2collapse.pl  /private/var/folders/rx/rt8glh297vbg70g644dpwy6w0000gn/T/Rtmp7xIt5c/temp_libpath160e7360bd99c/CLIPflexR/extdata/QF_FF_Fox3_Std_small_clip.fq.gz  /private/var/folders/rx/rt8glh297vbg70g644dpwy6w0000gn/T/Rtmp7xIt5c/temp_libpath160e7360bd99c/CLIPflexR/extdata/Collapsed_QF_FF_Fox3_Std_small_clip.fq 
FqFile_QFColStripped <- ctk_stripBarcode(FqFile_Col,linkerlength=5)
bowtie_align(FqFile_QFColStripped,myIndex)
#> [1] "/private/var/folders/rx/rt8glh297vbg70g644dpwy6w0000gn/T/Rtmp7xIt5c/temp_libpath160e7360bd99c/CLIPflexR/extdata/Sorted_Collapsed_QF_FF_Fox3_Std_small_clip.fq_rm5.gzfa.bam"
